_header: When Adam delve and Eve span spur if thou will speed
_description: A warning of the transitoriness of life — six 6-line stanzas (aaaabb) with internal rhyme and an ‘I and E’ refrain

CULDd564.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcription is London,  British Library Egerton 2257, f.
                    99.
